recipe.title: Apple Salad with Walnuts and Lime
ingredients: 2 crisp apples (such as Pink Lady or Honeycrisp), thinly sliced
1/2 cup grated provolone cheese or white cheddar
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Spread out breadcrumbs on a small rimmed baking sheet; toast, stirring occasionally, until golden brown, 6-8 minutes. Let cool. Meanwhile, spread out walnuts on a small rimmed baking sheet; toast, stirring occasionally, until golden brown, 8-10 minutes. Let cool; coarsely chop. Toss breadcrumbs, walnuts, apples, scallions, parsley, lime juice, and red pepper flakes in a large bowl; season with salt and pepper. Add cheese and oil; toss gently.
